pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration (plugin JSON creator)
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-16869
In plugin JSON file, there is a key called outputs. outputs is a list of plugin properties that represent the output schema of a particular plugin.
This PR creates a page for outputs field configuration. From the UI side, we'll let the user only set the name of the outputs.

nodes.bodyText: It is a little misleading that we call the page as "Outputs" but allow the user to specify only one plugin property. Can we change the title to Output and prepopulate a plugin property that the user has already configured? They can configure a plugin property to have schema editor
